definitions: distribution in zones or regions of definite character

examples.text: quartz grains can exhibit zonation and rounding

shortDefinitions: distribution in zones or regions of definite character

definitions: the distribution of plants or animals into specific zones according to such parameters as altitude or depth, each characterized by its dominant species

examples.text: this zonation involves encrusting lichens, sedentary animals, and seaweeds

shortDefinitions: distribution of plants or animals into specific zones according to such parameters as altitude or depth
